item.title: Team Topologies
item.author: Jacob Duijzer
item.description: Team Topologies: is an excellent guide to structuring and keeping teams, processes and technologies aligned, for all kinds of organisations. It gives us a vocabulary and a model to direct our thinking in a way that allows for scaling up, and helps us to organise teams for effective software development.
